item.title: A stochastic process crib sheet
item.description: A one-page crib sheet for stochastic process is attached here.

item.title: Experience
item.description: Past Experiences Georgia Tech, Atlanta, GA, USA, August 2017 - May 2022 Graduate Research and Teaching Assistant Research intern at Alibaba US-Damo Academy, Bellevue, WA, USA, Summer 2020 Mentors: Dr. Wotao Yin, Dr. Jian Tan, and Mou Sun Convergent decomposition algorithms for mixed-integer programs with block angular structures Grid Optimization Competition I have participated in the ARPA-E Grid Optimization Competition (GO Competition). Entrant teams from around the globe strive to develop innovative algorithmic software for modern power grids in the form of coding competition.

item.title: Research
item.description: Research Interest Topics of recent interests: Distributed and decomposition algorithms for continuous/discrete optimization Theory and algorithms based on nonconvex augmented Lagrangian duality Convexification and smoothing in optimization Google Scholar Preprint Recent Developments in Security-Constrained AC Optimal Power Flow: Overview of Challenge 1 in the ARPA-E Grid Optimization Competition Ignacio Aravena, Daniel K Molzahn, Shixuan Zhang, et al. Submitted, 2022 An ADMM-based Distributed Optimization Method for Solving Security-Constrained AC Optimal Power Flow Amin Gholami, Kaizhao Sun, Shixuan Zhang, and Andy Sun Submitted, 2021 Dual descent ALM and ADMM Kaizhao Sun and Andy Sun Submitted, 2021 Decomposition Methods for Global Solutions of Mixed-Integer Linear Programs Kaizhao Sun, Mou Sun, and Wotao Yin Submitted, 2021 Log-Difference-of-Convex (Log-DC) Sampling by the Unadjusted Langevin Algorithm Jiaming Liang, Kaizhao Sun, Enlu Zhou, and Andy Sun Publication Kaizhao Sun and Xu Andy Sun.
